channel.title: Website of Alexei Gazca
channel.description: Recent content on Website of Alexei Gazca

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! I am Alexei Gazca (aka Pablo Alexei Gazca Orozco), currently a postdoctoral researcher at the Mathematical Institute at the University of Freiburg in Germany, in the group of Michael Růžička.

item.title: Academic History
item.description:
since 2020 Postdoctoral researcher, Chair in Applied Analysis, FAU Erlangen-Nürnberg, Germany (in the group of Prof. Enrique Zuazua).

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Submitted (in review) J. Blechta, P. A. Gazca-Orozco, A.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Current Teaching This semester I am be teaching an introductory course on Numerical Analysis.
